eu.sapere.middleware.agent
Class SmartSapereAgent

java.lang.Object
  eu.sapere.middleware.node.notifier.Subscriber
      eu.sapere.middleware.node.lsaspace.SapereAgent
          eu.sapere.middleware.agent.SmartSapereAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyValueListener, Runnable
public abstract class SmartSapereAgent
extends SapereAgent
implements PropertyValueListener, Runnable

The abstract class that realize an agent that manages an LSA. The Agent is represented by an implicit LSA, each operation on the LSA is automatically and transparently propagated to the LSA space.

Author:
Gabriella Castelli (UNIMORE)
